title: Winter's Peace
description: Since Persephone has begun making her annual journey to the Underworld, Hades and Demeter have not spoken. The god of the dead has forwarded her messages with Hermes, but the goddess has not responded. Can Demeter be angry with him for eternity? There is only one way for Hades to find out: he must go see his sister himself.
author: Dominique Wren
